body.name: Descaling Powder Solution (6-Uses) Coffee Machine Descaler Cleaner | Compatible with Breville Keurig Nespresso Delonghi Ninja | To Descale Automatic Coffee Pots & Makers & Espresso Machines
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 8 hrs 31 mins
features: Versatile Compatibility: Whether you have a drip coffee maker, a Keurig, a Nespresso, a Delonghi, a Ninja, or any other coffee equipment, our cleaner is suitable for all types of coffee makers. Keep your machine in peak condition to ensure every cup is as delicious as the last.

Extend the Lifespan: Regularly cleaning your coffee machine with Bastion's Citric Acid-based formula can help extend the lifespan of your appliance. By preventing clogs and ensuring optimal performance, you'll get more value from your investment.

Easy to Use: Our single-use packets are pre-measured for your convenience. Simply empty the contents of a sachet into your coffee machine's water reservoir and run a cleaning cycle as instructed in your machine's manual. It's a hassle-free way to maintain your appliance.

Food-Safe and Eco-Friendly: Bastion Coffee Machine Cleaner is made from 100% food-grade citric acid, a natural and safe option for cleaning. It's also gentle on the environment, as it doesn't contain harsh chemicals.

No Vinegar Aftertaste or Odor: Unlike traditional vinegar-based cleaners, Bastion leaves no unpleasant aftertaste or odor in your coffee machine. Enjoy the pure, untainted flavor of your coffee with every brew.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Tear open one packet of Bastion Coffee Machine Descaler and add it to the empty water reservoir. Fill the water reservoir with warm/hot water and stir to dissolve and evenly mix the product If your machine has a “Descale Mode”, select this setting. If not, brew using the large cup setting repeatedly (without coffee or pod) until the reservoir is empty or until the machine indicates low water level. Rinse any remaining mixture from the water reservoir. Brew 3 more pots / cups using only water, then resume regular brewing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was having issues with my machine, and a friend recommended trying a descaler before investing in a new one. I'm so glad I did!This descaler worked like a charm. The instructions were clear and easy to follow. Within just one cycle, I noticed a significant improvement in the taste of my coffee. The machine seems to be working more efficiently, and the coffee now has that fresh and crisp flavor I was missing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So much better than using the water/vinegar mix as it stinks up the house for several hours. There is no smell and did a great job getting the coffee maker clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Keep your coffee delicious
reviews.reviewText: These tablets dissolve easily. No odor. Fast and easy to use. My coffee at home is better than cafes/coffee shops. I clean the pot regularly and use filtered water for cleaning. Would give this product 5 stars if it was slightly less expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleaned the limescale from my machine
reviews.reviewText: After dealing with some annoying issues with my coffee maker, I stumbled upon the Bastion Coffee Machine Descaler, and let me tell you, it's been great.I was skeptical at first, but the limescale buildup in my machine was affecting the taste and performance, so I gave it a shot. The results were seriously impressive. It tackled the limescale like a pro, and now my coffee tastes better than ever.What I appreciate most is the simplicity. No rocket science here – just pour it in, run a cycle, and you're good to go. I noticed a noticeable improvement in water flow and heating speed right away. It's like my coffee machine got a makeover.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars From Urnex to Bastion!
reviews.reviewText: I’m a coffee aficionado but also a bargain shopper. As a gift ,I received a Breville Barista one-touch espresso machine which I love and am very careful to maintain and keep clean. I've used other descaling products in the past, including the popular Urnex Dezcal, and I couldn't be happier with my switch to Bastion.What immediately caught my attention was the incredible value Bastion offers. With six packets in a box, it's a much better value. I used to pay $10-12 for four packets of Urnex Dezcal, and now I get six Bastion packets for under $10! That’s nearly half price! I clean my machine every 2 months so the difference in price adds up.The descaling performance is on par with other leading brands. The powder dissolves easily, and I’m getting at least the same results if not better from Bastion . I’m very happy with the switch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product, cleans well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Way better than vinegar.
reviews.reviewText: Before discovering this product, I was using vinegar to descale my coffee machine, thinking it was the most effective solution. However, the Bastion descaler has proven to be a way better!The first thing I noticed was the convenience of the application. The Bastion descaler comes in easy-to-use packets, eliminating the mess and guesswork associated with measuring out the right amount of liquid. The clear instructions made the descaling process a breeze, even for someone like me who isn't particularly handy.One of the significant advantages over vinegar is the lack of residual taste and odor. With vinegar, the lingering smell could affect the taste of my coffee for a while after descaling. The Bastion descaler, on the other hand, leaves no trace of unpleasant odors, ensuring that each cup of coffee is as flavorful as it should be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It really makes a difference.
reviews.reviewText: As a coffee enthusiast, I rely on my coffee machine daily, and over time, I noticed a decrease in its performance. That's when I decided to give this descaler a try, and I'm so glad I did.The box comes with six individual packets, making it convenient and easy to manage and store. Each packet is perfectly measured for a single use, eliminating any guesswork. The powder dissolves quickly and efficiently, ensuring a hassle-free descaling process.What sets the Bastion Coffee Machine Descaler apart is its effectiveness. After using it just once, I noticed a significant improvement in my coffee's flavor and the speed at which my machine brewed. It removed the mineral buildup and scale that had accumulated over time, giving my machine a new lease on life.
